conditions.name: dry_waste_reduction_percent
conditions.label: Dry waste reduction percentage compared to last year
conditions.description: The percentage reduction in dry waste generated by the building compared to the previous year
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user to provide the percentage by which dry waste generation has been reduced in the current year compared to the previous year. Explain that this includes paper, cardboard, plastic, and other non-organic waste materials.

conditions.name: dry_waste_recycled_percent
conditions.label: Dry waste recycled percentage
conditions.description: The percentage of total dry waste that is being recycled or sent for recycling
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their total dry waste (paper, plastic, cardboard, etc.) is currently being recycled. This should be the portion that goes to recycling facilities rather than landfills.

conditions.name: wet_waste_composted_percent
conditions.label: Wet waste composted percentage
conditions.description: The percentage amount of wet waste that was being composted in the facility last year
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their wet waste (food scraps, organic matter, kitchen waste) is being composted either on-site or sent to composting facilities. This helps determine organic waste management efficiency.

conditions.name: eco_labelled_product_cost_percent
conditions.label: Eco-labelled product cost percentage during retrofitting
conditions.description: The percentage of total retrofitting costs spent on eco-labelled or environmentally certified products
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their total retrofitting budget was spent on products with environmental certifications or eco-labels (like Energy Star, EPEAT, Green Seal, etc.). This measures sustainable procurement practices.

conditions.name: certified_green_products_count
conditions.label: Number of certified green products used
conditions.description: The total count of environmentally certified products used during retrofitting activities
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user to count how many individual products with environmental certifications (Energy Star, EPEAT, Green Seal, etc.) were used in their retrofitting project. Count each distinct product type.

conditions.name: sustainable_procurement_policy
conditions.label: Does the building have a sustainable procurement policy?
conditions.description: Whether the building management has established a formal policy for purchasing environmentally sustainable products and services
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user if their building has a written sustainable procurement policy that guides purchasing decisions toward environmentally friendly products and services. This should be a documented policy, not just informal practices.

parts.name: roof_uhi_coverage_percent
parts.label: Roof area with high SRI/green/reflective/solar coverage (% of total roof area)
parts.description: The percentage of total roof area covered with high Solar Reflectance Index materials, green roofs, reflective surfaces, or solar panels to reduce urban heat island effect
parts.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their total roof area is covered with heat-reducing features like high SRI materials, green roofs, reflective coatings, or solar panels. These help reduce the urban heat island effect by reflecting heat or providing cooling.

parts.name: non_roof_uhi_coverage_percent
parts.label: Non-roof hardscape with high SRI/green/reflective/shaded coverage (% of total non-roof hardscape)
parts.description: The percentage of non-roof hardscape areas (walkways, parking, patios) covered with high SRI materials, vegetation, reflective surfaces, or shading to reduce heat absorption
parts.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their non-roof hardscape areas (like walkways, parking lots, patios) have heat-reducing features such as high SRI materials, vegetation cover, reflective surfaces, or shade structures. This helps mitigate urban heat island effects.

condition.name: organic_fertilizer_coverage_percent
condition.label: Landscape maintained with organic fertilizers/soil conditioners (% of landscaped area)
condition.description: The percentage of landscaped area that is maintained using organic fertilizers and soil conditioners instead of synthetic chemicals
condition.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their landscaped area is maintained using organic fertilizers and soil conditioners rather than synthetic chemical fertilizers. This promotes soil health and reduces environmental impact.

additional_requirements.name: landscape_area_percent
additional_requirements.label: Landscaped area as % of total site area
additional_requirements.description: The percentage of total site area that is dedicated to landscaping with vegetation, gardens, or green spaces
additional_requirements.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their total site area is landscaped with vegetation, gardens, trees, or other green spaces. This excludes buildings, parking, and hardscape areas.

conditions.name: public_transport_compliant
conditions.label: Is the site within 800 m of public transport and serves >=60% occupants?
conditions.description: Within 800 m walking distance to rail/bus/metro AND provides network access for at least 60% occupants
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user if their building site is within 800 meters walking distance of public transportation (rail, bus, or metro) AND if this public transport network can serve at least 60% of the building occupants for their daily commute.

conditions.name: shuttle_service_coverage_percent
conditions.label: Shuttle service coverage (% of total occupants)
conditions.description: Dedicated shuttle service caters to at least 60% of building occupants to nearest drop zone
conditions.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of their building occupants are served by a dedicated shuttle service that connects them to the nearest public transport drop zone or major transit hub.

calculation.name: potable_water_savings_percent
calculation.label: Potable water savings percentage over baseline
calculation.description: The percentage reduction in potable water consumption compared to a baseline or previous year
calculation.prompt-description: Ask the user what percentage of potable water savings they have achieved compared to their baseline consumption (typically previous year or industry standard). This includes water saved through efficiency measures, recycling, or alternative sources.

credits.name: Enhanced Eco-friendly Refrigerants & Fire Suppression Management System

calculation.name: gwp_refrigerants_fire_suppression
calculation.label: Average GWP of all refrigerants/substances and fire suppression systems used in the building
calculation.description: The average Global Warming Potential value of all refrigerants and fire suppression substances used across the building's systems
calculation.prompt-description: Ask the user to provide the average Global Warming Potential (GWP) value of all refrigerants used in HVAC systems and substances used in fire suppression systems throughout their building. Lower GWP values indicate more environmentally friendly substances.
